New Records: Mo Wagner added 17 points for Orlando
Key Match Events: Boston and Alvarado combined for 15 points on a 17-1 Pelicans run that cut it to 10
Jalen Suggsâ€™ 3-pointer with 8:36 left in the third quarter ended a stretch of more than nine minutes in which the Magic did not make a field goal
Pre-Game Insights: The Pelicans announced two hours before tipoff that Zion Williamson would not play due to a tight left hamstring
Post-Match Reflections: The Magic won for the 10th straight time at home, going back to March 30 and including the postseason
They are 2-14 on the road in that span
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Magic converted six dunks, six layups and four 3-pointers
On their way to taking a 24-point lead in the first 18 minutes, the Magic survived a long cold stretch and 8-for-32 3-point shooting
Others: The Pelicans were missing six of its top eight scorers
The Magic lost five straight on a in which Paolo Banchero went out with a torn oblique
